13 enum {
14  MOTION_ACCEL_DATE_RATE_800HZ = 0,
15  MOTION_ACCEL_DATE_RATE_400HZ = 1,
16  MOTION_ACCEL_DATE_RATE_200HZ = 2,
17  MOTION_ACCEL_DATE_RATE_100HZ = 3,
18  MOTION_ACCEL_DATE_RATE_50HZ = 4,
19  MOTION_ACCEL_DATE_RATE_12_5HZ = 5,
20  MOTION_ACCEL_DATE_RATE_6_25HZ = 6,
21  MOTION_ACCEL_DATE_RATE_1_56HZ = 7,
22 };
23 
24 enum orientation {
25  MOTION_ACCEL_ORIENT_PORTRAIT_UP,
26  MOTION_ACCEL_ORIENT_PORTRAIT_DOWN,
27  MOTION_ACCEL_ORIENT_LANDSCAPE_LEFT,
28  MOTION_ACCEL_ORIENT_LANDSCAPE_RIGHT,
29  MOTION_ACCEL_ORIENT_FLAT_UP,
30  MOTION_ACCEL_ORIENT_FLAT_DOWN,
31  MOTION_ACCEL_ORIENT_ERROR
32 };
33 
34 enum pulse {
35  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_X_POS = (1<<0),
36  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_X_NEG = (1<<1),
37  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_Y_POS = (1<<2),
38  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_Y_NEG = (1<<3),
39  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_Z_POS = (1<<4),
40  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_Z_NEG = (1<<5)
41 };
42 
43 enum {
44  MOTION_ACCEL_FLAGS_REDUCED_NOISE = (1<<0),
45  MOTION_ACCEL_FLAGS_FAST_READ = (1<<1),
46  MOTION_ACCEL_FLAGS_ACTIVE = (1<<2),
47  MOTION_ACCEL_FLAGS_AUTO_SLEEP = (1<<3),
48 };
49 
50 enum motion_accel_pulse_list {
51  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_X_SINGLE = (1<<0),
52  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_X_DOUBLE = (1<<1),
53  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_Y_SINGLE = (1<<2),
54  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_Y_DOUBLE = (1<<3),
55  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_Z_SINGLE = (1<<4),
56  MOTION_ACCEL_PULSE_Z_DOUBLE = (1<<5)
57 };
58 
59 enum motion_accel_intr_list {
60  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_SLEEP_WAKE = (1<<7),
61  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_FIFO = (1<<6),
62  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_TRANSIENT = (1<<5),
63  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_PL = (1<<4),
64  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_PULSE = (1<<3),
65  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_FF = (1<<2),
66  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_DATA_READY = (1<<0)
67 };
68 
69 enum motion_accel_intr_wake {
70  MOTION_ACCEL_IINTR_WAKE_FIFO_GATE = (1<<7),
71  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_WAKE_TRANSIENT = (1<<6),
72  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_WAKE_PL = (1<<5),
73  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_WAKE_PULSE = (1<<4),
74  MOTION_ACCEL_INTR_WAKE_FF = (1<<3)
75 };

77 typedef struct {
78  float phi;
79  float the;
80  float psi;
81  float rho;
82  float delta;
83  u8 equations;
84  u8 calibrated;
85  u32 counter;
86 } motion_ecompass_t;
87 
88 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
89  i16 x;
90  i16 y;
91  i16 z;
92 } motion_accel_t;
93 
94 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
95  i16 x;
96  i16 y;
97  i16 z;
98  i8 die_temp;
99 } motion_mag_t;
100 
101 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
102  //data - power
103  u8 update;
104  u8 enable;
105  u16 data_rate;
106  u8 flags;
107 
108  //orientation
109  u8 orient_update;
110  u8 orient_enable;
111  u8 orient_threshold;
112  u8 orient_hyst;
113  u8 orient_count;
114  u8 orient_back_front_trip_angle;
115  u8 orient_zlock;
116 
117  //pulse
118  u8 pulse_update;
119  u8 pulse_enable;
120  u8 pulse_threshold_x;
121  u8 pulse_threshold_y;
122  u8 pulse_threshold_z;
123  u8 pulse_limit;
124  u8 pulse_latency;
125  u8 pulse_window;
126 
127  //free fall
128  u8 ff_update;
129  u8 ff_enable;
130  u8 ff_src;
131  u8 ff_threshold;
132  u8 ff_count;
133 
134  //interrupt
135  u8 intr_update;
136  u8 intr_enable;
137  u8 intr_select;
138  u8 intr_open_drain;
139  u8 intr_active_high;
140  u8 intr_wake;
141 } motion_accel_attr_t;
142 
143 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
144  u8 update;
145  u8 enable;
146  u16 data_rate;
147 } motion_mag_attr_t;
148 
149 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
150  motion_accel_attr_t accel;
151  motion_mag_attr_t mag;
152 
153  u8 ecompass_update;
154  u8 ecompass_enable;
155 
156 } motion_attr_t;
157 
158 enum {
159  MOTION_SENSOR_ACCEL_UPDATE_ORIENT = (1<<0),
160  MOTION_SENSOR_ACCEL_UPDATE_PULSE = (1<<1),
161  MOTION_SENSOR_ACCEL_UPDATE_INTR = (1<<2),
162  MOTION_SENSOR_ACCEL_UPDATE_DATA = (1<<3),
163  MOTION_SENSOR_MAG_UPDATE_DATA = (1<<4),
164  MOTION_SENSOR_MAG_UPDATE_TEMP = (1<<5)
165 };

167 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
168  motion_accel_t accel;
169  motion_ecompass_t ecompass;
170  motion_mag_t mag;
171 } motion_t;
172 
173 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
174  u8 update;
175  u8 accel_orient;
176  u8 accel_pulse;
177  u32 step_count;
178  motion_accel_t accel;
179  motion_mag_t mag;
180 } motion_sensor_t;

182 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
183  u8 update;
184 } motion_sensor_read_t;
